ESWAT MEANS: Enhanced Special Weapons and Tactics!
ou're staring straight into evil E.Y.E... a power-mad horde of vicious terrorists. But you arer the ultimate crimebuster. Decimate their front lines with your lead belching Gatling gun! Incinerate their mobs with your spinning flame-thrower! Start as an ESWAT rookie and blast your way to become an awesome supercop - more machine than man.

72986.name: ALMANiAC
72986.description: Players divide themselves in teams. Each team consists of two or more players. During each turn, one player of the team is designated the clue giver. The clue giver takes the next card from the box. There are six lists, each of a different category, of five proper names. The clue giver must give verbal clues to get the teammates to say each name on the assigned list. The team will advance its pawn one space for each correct response. The team has forty seconds, as counted by a sand timer, to get all five names. The team that first completes one circuit around the gameboard is the winner.

72988.name: Wizard of Wor
72988.description:
From the box cover

Outwit and outshoot the Wizard in the dreaded dungeons of Wor!
One moment Worrior. Before you accept this challenge, beware its unique dangers.
To survive this first dungeon, you must outshoot and vaporize all Burwors.
Next, destroy every visible and Invisible Garwor and Thorwor or be eaten...ALIVE.
Bull-eye the winged Worluk before he escape. DARE NOT freeze at the escape doors.
When lightening moving at magical speeds appear, take your best aim - its the angered WIZARD.
Your defenses: a joystick, fire button, radar screen and will to win.

72990.name: Himmelveil Sewers
72990.description:
From the publisher's website:

Himmelveil Sewers is the foundational, fantasy sewer infrastructure setting you’ve been dreaming of (if you dream of sewers that is...gross!)! A setting of previously unheard of modularity and flexibility, two years in the making!

Utilizing WorldWorksGames exclusive TerrainlinX system, Sewers allows you to create true multi-leveled sewer layouts which sit below Himmelveil Streets! Layouts can be built to any configuration and to any height. This isn’t just static boxes and inflexibly structured building shapes; this is a reusable tool-set and an endless torrent of possibilities in all shapes, sizes and dimensions. And best of all, when you’re done everything stores flat!

It almost seems silly to mention this in passing but Himmelveil Sewers is also automated craft cutter friendly! An industry first for this type of terrain product!

Beneath the bustling streets of Himmelveil is a murky world of twisting tunnels and foul odours. A refuge for thieves, cutthroats and worse and a highway for contraband, this dank domain is home to some of the most deadly dangers any would-be adventurers are ever likely to face. Better keep your wits about you... if the stink doesn't get you, the rats surely will...

The ultimate companion set to Streets of Himmelveil, Himmelveil Sewers contains:

* 11 6"x6" floors in 1", 1.5" and gridless formats
* 8 3"x6" floors in 1", 1.5" and gridless formats
* 12 3"x3" floors in 1", 1.5" and gridless formats
* 6" and 3" balconies
* 6" and 3" balcony supports
* 6" and 3" plug-in railings
* 8 3" walls in flat and our exclusive Anti-Warp format
* 8 6" walls in flat and exclusive our Anti-Warp format
* Short angled wall in flat and our exclusive Anti-Warp format
* Long angled wall in flat and our exclusive Anti-Warp format
* 6 varieties of corner posts
* GSD automated cutting support.

boardgamehonor: 2011 Golden Geek Best Family Board Game Nominee
2011 International Gamers Award - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee
2011 Spiel der Spiele Game of the Year Winner
72991.description:
In Asara, you take on the role of a wealthy builder competing to bring the most prestige to your name through constructing the largest and most ornate towers in the city. The game is played over 4 rounds (years), during which you will be acquiring the pieces for your towers and assembling them.

Players are given a hand of cards with different colors. On their turn, players play a card from their hand to an action space on the board. These spaces allow players to acquire tower pieces, get money, build a portion of their towers, etc. Once a card has been played in one of the action spaces on the board, all subsequent cards played in that area have to follow the original card’s color. Turns continue around the table until all players are out of cards for that round.

Scoring happens at the end of each round based on the number of towers a player has and the ornamentation present on those towers. After the scoring at the end of round 4, a final scoring occurs and bonus prestige points are given to the players with the largest towers of each color, the most towers, and the largest tower overall. The player with the most prestige points is the winner.
72991.name: Asara

72992.name: Himmelveil Canals
72992.description:
From the publisher's website:

The fantasy city of Himmelveil NEEDS WATER!!! No medieval, Victorian or even modern European setting is complete without canals! Weave waterways through your village or city street layout, create expansive waterfront harbor settings complete with elevated docks and boardwalks, or stack your canal system to create tiered locks, subterranean street flows and dramatic waterfalls! Dozens of expertly crafted modular TerrainlinX tiles from veteran terrain designer Denny Unger, help you create a nearly unlimited variety of watery infrastructure settings.

Not only that but we’ve included harbor walls, dock walls, unique outlets and locks to enclose, elevate or submerge your canal and harbor layouts!!!

Taking advantage of our smash hit TerrainlinX build system, your layouts are no longer limited by restrained, static "shoebox" design but are fully on-the-fly modular and expansive in every dimension! With automated "robocutting" support (Craftrobo & Silhouette SD compatible) and complete cross compatibility with other TerrainlinX settings, this is another must have addition for any TLX collector looking to expand their build potential!

Himmelveil Canals Includes all of the following:

· 26 custom designed canal tiles covering: canals, boardwalks, 3" & 6" elevated docks, open water, harbor settings. Comes complete in 1", 1.5" and No Grid formats! Utilizes WWG’s unobtrusive organic grid system (natural elements make the grid).

· 3" and 6" dock railing

· 1", 1.5" & 3" wide dock stairs

· 6" Walls: Bay walls, Posted dock walls, Timber dock walls, Flood gate wall, Closed Lock wall, Cascading Sculptured outflow walls.

· 3" Walls: Dock walls, Bay walls.

· 2, 3 & 4-Way Posts in dock and bay formats.

· TerrainlinX mounting templates

· Full GSD automated cutting support and cutting templates.

· And as always, detailed instructions and easy to follow guides.

72993.name: Dictum: The Latin Rummy Card Game
72993.description: From the rulebook: "Each card has printed on it one Latin word. The aim of the game is to make phrases out of these words, from the list given, to make a 'full house'."

72994.description:
Fast and easy to learn tactical wargame about medieval battles.

It is a card driven game, with historical leaders, cavalry charges and countercharges, infantry defending in fortified terrain, crossbow fire and bombardment, and much more. The unique combat system and a new way to visualize the battlefield makes this game a new quality in the world of the tactical wargames.

There are many scenarios in the base game, concerning battlefields of the:
- Wars of the Roses,
- Wars of Scottish Independence,
- Hundred Years' War.

The modular board and cube-based way to visualize troops on the battlefield, let players to create an infinite number of scenarios of the whole medieval era.

Thanks to the "play and learn" rulebook composition, this game can be played with equal pleasure by two experienced players, as well as by a father and son.
72994.name: Battles: The Knights

72995.name: Paterfamilias
72995.description:
Publisher Blurb:

Paterfamilias is a new story in the Storytelling Adventure System for Requiem for Rome, a Vampire: The Requiem series.

Containing a collection of scenes, Storyteller character records, a number of hyperlinks to various portions of the text as well as bookmarks, so you can always jump right to what you need with just a click. There's also a new hunter group provided, as well as errata for Requiem for Rome and Fall of the Camarilla.

72996.name: Descent: Road to Legend Lieutenants – Thaadd the Destroyer
72996.description:
From the back of the package:

A mighty Overlord treading the path of legend needs strong leaders to oversee his many minions.

Bring your Road to Legend Lieutenant tokens alive with 3D minis!

Thaadd the Destroyer serves the Titan Warlord with his enormous bulk and strength. While leading a brigade of ogres, Thaadd makes short work of anything standing in his way. Armies, cities, heroes... it makes no difference, all must be destroyed!

Cost: 15.
Avatar: Titan Only.
Power: Hordes of the Things.
Minions: 2 Ogres, 1 Master Ogre.

Cities have their Defense rating reduced by one while under siege by him. He has Reach and Knockback. If he deals at least 1 damage to a hero (after applying armor), roll a black power die. If you roll a surge, the hero must choose and discard one of his equipped items.

72997.name: Descent: Road to Legend Lieutenants – Dar Hilzernod
72997.description:
From the back of the package:

A mighty Overlord treading the path of legend needs strong leaders to oversee his many minions.

Bring your Road to Legend Lieutenant tokens alive with 3D minis!

Dragons fight for territory and treasure, but the creature known as Dar Hilzernod fought against the Great Wyrm and lost. Now, its spectral cropse flies abroad, spreading death and decay whenever it goes.

Cost: 20.
Avatar: Great Wyrm only.
Power: Special (see below).
Minions: no minions.

He may only be played at the Gold level of the campaign. If he can roll to resolve a siege, he automatically succeeds. When he is reinforcing, roll a black power die at the start of the overlord's turn. On a surge, every hero on the board suffers 1 wound (ignoring armor). This wound may not be prevented. He has Flying and Breath.

72998.name: Irish Quest
72998.description:
When times are tough, as indeed they are just now, gather your friends and family around the table and cosy up for a few hours of traditional fun with Irish Quest. Together you can rediscover your Irish roots and the family values that really matter when you play Irish Quest. An ideal way to spend quality time together. Be Irish and proud of it!

Your Country, Your Heritage, Your Passion

Test your knowledge of everything Irish and learn so much more by playing Irish Quest. With over 2,000 Irish multiple-choice questions in four different categories HISTORY, LAND AND NATURE, CULTURE and MODERN there’s so much to share and learn, and the accompanying booklet enhances the experience with further explanations for many of the more interesting and unusual answers. But beware! As you tour the country to collect the letters ‘Q U E S T’, Destiny cards may help or hinder you and you will need to earn sovereigns to help pay your way.

72999.name: Descent: Road to Legend Lieutenants – Kar-Amag-Atoth
72999.description:
From the back of the package:

A mighty Overlord treading the path of legend needs strong leaders to oversee his many minions.

Bring your Road to Legend Lieutenant tokens alive with 3D minis!

The demon sorcerer Kar-Amag-Atoth was once three separate mortal men, each of whom sold his soul to the Demon Prince. Now, Kar-Amag-Atoth is the Demon Prince's most powerful agent in this world, sacrificing all those who oppose him on his black altar!

Cost: 16.
Avatar: Demon Prince only.
Power: DOOM!
Minions: 1 Demon, 4 Sorcerers, 1 Master Sorcerer.

Whenever he razes a city, the overlord gains five conquest tokens. He has Fear 2, Aura 3, Unstoppable, and whenever he deals the killing blow to a hero, the overlord receives two extra conquest tokens.

73000.name: Descent: Road to Legend Lieutenants – Gata the White Death
73000.description:
From the back of the package:

A mighty Overlord treading the path of legend needs strong leaders to oversee his many minions.

Bring your Road to Legend Lieutenant tokens alive with 3D minis!

Gata the White Dead is as whisper-silent and deadly as a knife in the dark. He is the personal assassin of the Beastman Lord, a solitary figure moving through the night and ending the lives of all who dare oppose his master.

Cost: 13.
Avatar: Beastman Lord only.
Power: none.
Minions: no minions.

He may only be played at the Silver level of the campaign or higher. When he is encountered, roll one black die. On any result except a blank, the heroes are ambushed. He has the Shadowcloak ability and if he deals at least 1 damage to a hero (after applying armor), roll a black power die. If you roll a blank, the hero is instantly killed, regardless of wounds or armor.
